name: Super Soccer (itch)
description:
get the ball across the room into the goal. But don't let the ball touch the bombs!

this is a work in progress!!!

  • -might run slow on slow computers
  • -might be super janky
  • -crashes when it is suposed to restart (just open the game manualy again for now)
  • -just 1 level, might add more later
these are the controls

there is also support for gamepad  controllers:

  1.  left stick forward and backwards
    right stick turns left and right
  2. x or A button for jump (doublejump by pressing it twice)
  3. right bumper to restart (or exit the game  for now)
